title: Bitcoin slides below $9,000
text:
Bitcoin slides below $9,000 11:34pm GMT - 01:06 
Bitcoin tumbled below $9,000 for the first time this year as a Facebook ban on cryptocurrency advertisements added another reason for investors to go sour on the volatile asset. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Bitcoin tumbled below $9,000 for the first time this year as a Facebook ban on cryptocurrency advertisements added another reason for investors to go sour on the volatile asset.
